room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard’s Revenge" by Crack the Code in Laconia
review: My husband and I are escape room enthusiasts. We played Blackbeard Revenge at Crack the Code. It was exactly what we look for in escape rooms. We were greeted by the owner, who was very welcoming and friendly. The room was well decorated and the puzzles were challenging and entertaining!! We would recommend this place to anyone and cannot wait to visit them for their new room!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard’s Revenge" by Crack the Code in Laconia
review: Astonished how great this room was to play, the room was very well designed puzzle-wise. The theme of the escape room was also well captured and made you feel like you were in Blackbeard's quarters. The owners were very welcoming and knowledgeable about escape rooms. We will be back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard’s Revenge" by Crack the Code in Laconia
review: So much fun! Our family did Blackbeard’s Revenge and really loved it. The puzzles were great, organized, and challenging. The owners were fantastic and we really couldn’t recommend this place more!
